resources.string: Allow Install with Options to send anonymous crash and error logs to Bugsnag. Disabling this requires an app restart to take effect.
Shizuku is required for this app to function. Would you like to download it now?
Shizuku needs to be running for this app to function. Follow the directions in the Shizuku app to start it.
If the package being installed already exists, replace/upgrade it.
If the package being installed is a test-only app, allow it to be installed.
Tells the system that the install request was made by ADB.
Install the package for all users on the system, instead of just the specified or default user.
Attempts to downgrade the currently-installed version of the package to the one being installed.

Automatically grant all permissions the package is requesting. Note that this only applies to runtime permissions. Special permissions like All Files Access or Accessibility won\'t be automatically granted.
Allows specifying a volume UUID to install the package to.
Forces even system installers to show the install confirmation prompt.
Install the package as an instant app.
Used when installing a feature for a split app to prevent the main app from being killed during install.
Indicates that the package being installed is a full app. Can be used to upgrade instant apps to full apps.
Indicates that the package is \"critical to system health or security\" and will more aggressively delete clearable files to make space if needed.
Indicates that the package is a virtual preload.
Indicates that the package being installed is an APEX package.
Allow future rollbacks of this package.
Disables package verification during install. This is not signature verification.
Indicates this package is being installed as part of a staged install.
Allow restricted permissions to be granted for the package being installed.
Don\'t check whether the installed APEX can be updated.
Allows apps targeting old SDK versions to be installed.
Allows installing or upgrading packages targeting SDK letters.
Verify the package, but don\'t install it.
Enable update ownership enforcement on the current session.
Indicates that the current session is from a managed user or profile.
Ignore dexopt profiles for this package during installation.
Specify the package name of the app that Android should report this APK was installed by (e.g., com.android.vending).
Set the reason for this installation.
Please make sure you have a file browser installed to pick APKs.
